articles.author: J. Scott Trubey
articles.title: Georgia climbs to 4th nationally in COVID-19 hospitalizations, White House says - Atlanta Journal Constitution
articles.description: Georgia reported the fourth worst rate of new COVID-19 hospital admissions in the country last week, a federal report said, and the worst is likely still ahead.
articles.content: Hospitals across the state have warned of overflowing critical care units and emergency rooms and fears of rationed care. Wednesday brought an alarming call from the CEO of the states largest hospita… [+4261 chars]
